choices: You have awoken in your bed.
You are in a strangers house, on their nightstand overlooking an empty room.
You are in the middle of a street with daylight still blinding you.
You believe that you are dreaming, and have awoken in a strange land.
1.content: From you calculations you seem to be at least 1 inch tall. As you look around you start to understand where it is you have awoken.
1.title: Where am I?

11.content: Upon realisation, it becomes apparent to you, that you are indeed standing on the covers of your bed. As you look around you notice, that you are no longer clothed. You now know what gender you are?
11.title: You have awoken in your bed.

choices: You decide to visit your older sisters room.
You decide to visit you younger sisters room.
113.content:
So you seems to have lost your genitalia, this includes any features that would make you either of the two genders. You decide that it is time to start exploring your surroundings. You start by descending from your bed, this is easy as th bottom sheet seems to have fallen to the floor, allowing for ease of access.

Once you make it to the floor, you notice that the flooring is wooden, making it easy to traverse than that of carpet, or tiles. You then decide that it is best to leave your room, as you begin the long journey to your door, memories start to flood back to you.

You remember that you name is John Sealmen and you where once a young 16 year-old male, but it seems now that you are neither male or female. You also remember that you have 2 sisters, one sister whom is 21 years old and a younger sister whom is 12 years old. Your memories are still coming back to you, and will overtime. Once you reach the door, you decide it's best to make your way to one of them for help.
113.title: You are genderless

info.brief_description: You have shrunk, what adventures await you, will you be able to surivive, or...
info.description: You are suddenly awoken by a blinding light, as the light fades you notice that there seems to be something off. Your surroundings are much bigger than they once where, you notice that you have awoken in an unfamiliar place. This place seems unknown to you?...
